attributes.action: Stop Tax payer money going to Unions
attributes.additional_details:
STOP FUNDING THE UNIONS WITH TAX PAYERS MONEY – THE UNIONS SHOULD BE FORCED TO REFUND ALL FUNDS THEY HAVE TAKEN IMMEDIATELY.
The Government Departments and Council should not be using Tax Payer money to fund the Unions; this money is needed for tax payers.  This was a political act by Labour and should be stopped immediately.  Tax payer’s money should not be used to fund the financial wing of the Labour party.  These are the same Unions going on strike to force the tax payer to pay for their Golden Pensions, they should pay for their own pensions like the rest of us.

The Government should force the Unions to return the funds they have been given.
